product_overview: ZenAlgorithm is a sophisticated, high-performance automated trading platform designed for quantitative and algorithmic traders. It integrates multiple trading strategies with AI-driven market intelligence, providing real-time execution, risk assessment, and comprehensive performance analytics through a user-friendly dashboard and detailed reports.
core_goals: Provide a robust, multi-strategy trading engine supporting both paper and live trading modes.
Integrate AI-powered market intelligence for trade validation, risk detection, and performance optimization.
Deliver real-time monitoring and control via a modern frontend dashboard with strategy management capabilities.
Ensure seamless broker API integration with native support for Kotak Neo API and WebSocket live price streaming.
Offer comprehensive reporting through daily and weekly automated PDF generation summarizing system and strategy performance.
key_features: Multi-Strategy Trading Engine capable of parallel execution and efficient position management.
AI Brain module (Gemini Integration) for market regime detection, dynamic risk assessment, and LLM-driven trade insights.
Frontend Dashboard developed with React and Vite, featuring real-time PnL tracking, heatmaps, performance analytics, and strategy toggling.
Robust broker adapter supporting Kotak Neo API V2, including WebSocket handlers for live market data and historical data preloading for strategy warmup.
Circuit breaker and anomaly detection modules to safeguard against catastrophic losses and trading anomalies.
Extensive indicator calculations including EMA, RSI, ATR, ADX, MACD, VWAP and custom heuristics for various strategies.
Adaptive learning system with Bayesian and ML components to optimize trade decisions and parameters based on historical data.
Comprehensive integration with Telegram for instant alerts on trade events, system status and circuit breaker triggers.
Modular strategy adapters encapsulating individual trading logics such as ORB Breakout, RSI Pullback, EMA Regime, Statistical Sniper, Failed Auction, and several others.
user_flow_summary: User configures API keys and trading preferences via .env and frontend settings.
TradingEngine initializes, loads strategies, and preloads historical data for warming indicators.
Real-time market data streamed via WebSocket or polled REST API fallback.
Strategies process incoming data, generate signals with AI validation and risk checks.
Trades are simulated or sent through broker adapters for paper or real execution.
System status, strategy performance, and AI brain insights are updated and served on the dashboard.
User can pause/resume strategies, adjust capital allocations, and trigger emergency shutdown from UI.
Daily automated PDF reports generated with detailed trade and performance analysis.
Telegram alerts notify user of critical events, trade entries/exits, and risk exposures.
validation_criteria: Successful connection and authentication with Kotak Neo API using token refresh or auto-login.
Accurate multi-timeframe indicator calculations matching offline backtest results per strategy.
AI Brain producing consistent confidence scores and recommendations aligned with historical data.
WebSocket handler delivering reliable, low-latency live price updates and bar aggregations.
Frontend dashboard accurately reflects real-time strategy and portfolio status without lag or errors.
Circuit breaker triggers appropriately and prevents trades on drawdown thresholds being exceeded.
Trade history saved and recovered correctly from MongoDB with no loss or corruption.
Backtest algorithms reproduce PDF benchmark metrics within acceptable tolerance.
All critical API endpoints return valid, timely data and appropriate HTTP status codes.
User-initiated manual controls work as expected with correct server responses.
Safety checks such as bad tick filtering and risk validation prevent erroneous trades.
Trading strategies honor regime gating and manual override settings.
PDF reports generate without errors and include required visual elements and statistics.
